title: 1 Bedroom Carpet
posting_body: ['*** Application and background check (NO application fee) ***No recent evictions or multiple evictions/force outs.', 'No Pets', '1 bedroom west side ( Detroit Shore way area/ apartment', 'Professionally cleaned carpet (Bedroom Size - Approx.', '11 ft X 8.5 ft )  Security Cameras in Common areas, On-Site Building Custodian.', 'each unit has it own furnace, tenant controls temperature of their apartment', 'Location: Minutes to Gordon Square, Ohio City, 5 minutes to downtown, minutes from lakefront/beach', 'Tenant responsible for utilities ( water, gas and electric) the first 2 months water are free', 'Included:  trash, gas stove, refrigerator, on site coin laundry, ample parking, RTA stop', 'please call/text Mike for appointment', 'show contact info', '*** Application and background check (NO application fee) ***No recent evictions or multiple evictions/force outs.', 'No Pets']
